deepwiki.description: The DeepWiki MCP server provides programmatic access to DeepWiki's repository documentation (Devin Wiki) and search capabilities (Devin Search).

jira.description: The Jira MCP server provides programmatic access to Jira's issue tracking capabilities.

linear.description: The Linear MCP server provides programmatic access to Linear's issue tracking capabilities.

scrapegraph.description: The ScrapeGraph MCP server provides programmatic access to ScrapeGraph AI's web scraping capabilities, including smart scraping, web crawling, search scraping, and agentic scraping workflows.
